page.title: 12COMPUTERISED COWS
page.content: Mr.Carrington owns a farm where the cows are milked and fed by computer .In the milking parlour there are bays for 14 cows.When the cows are led into the parlour Mr.Carrington feeds the number, which is stamped on the rear of the cow,into the computer.The computer then decides how much feed the cow needs and automatically sends the right amount of food into the feeding bowl for that cow.It also decides how much milk that cow should give and after the correct amount has been delivered through the milking machine, the machine to that cow switches off and the machine drops off the teets and allows the cow to leave the shed.
